messages.CommunityBugFixCollection.Name: Community Bug-Fix Collection
messages.CommunityBugFixCollection.Description: This mod contains fixes for various small Resonite Issues that are still open.
messages.CommunityBugFixCollection.NoZeroScaleToo: Fixes Resonite Issue #98: World crashes when a (multi)tool is scaled to zero.
messages.CommunityBugFixCollection.CaseInsensitiv: Makes picking custom generic type parameters case-insensitive.
